items.headline: Nvidia is dealt an antitrust setback in China. What it means for the stock.
items.summary_en: China says Nvidia violated antitrust rules. An analyst says it’s just ‘noise’ but shows that Nvidia’s interests could be used as leverage in broader U.S.-China trade talks.
